title: Watchmen The End is Nigh-.
description:
Watchmen The End is Nigh 1. Install Steam 2. Copy folder "Watchmen" to SteamSteamAppscommon 3. Copy and replace file "KapowMulti.exe" from folder "Crack" to Steam/steamapps/common/watchmen/data/Engine 4. Don`t forget to update DirectX and Physix 5. Smoke some weed 6. Play!
